Before leaving Overton, the four girls visited Ruth Denton. The brave freshman declined an offer to spend the summer with Arline Thayer but accepted a job in Overton with a dressmaker. She promised to spend the last two weeks of her vacation at the sea-shore with Arline. The campus was like a vast green carpet, and the trees still had their pale green color, not yet turning darker for summer.
